channel.title: Legendary Thread: 1UP's World of WarCraft Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: The 1UP Network's resident World of Warcraft addicts reluctantly take a break from actually playing WoW to talk about playing WoW, and cover the latest news, messageboard flame wars, and gameplay tips along the way. wowpodcast.1up.com
channel.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
channel.itunes:summary: The 1UP Network's resident World of Warcraft addicts reluctantly take a break from actually playing WoW to talk about playing WoW, and cover the latest news, messageboard flame wars, and gameplay tips along the way. wowpodcast.1up.com

item.title: Legendary Thread: 1UP's World of WarCraft Podcast - 12/22/2008
item.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
item.itunes:subtitle: On this episode the crew decides what faction they are going to play, and Mikey names some of his favorite trinkets.
item.description: On this episode the crew decides what faction they are going to play, and Mikey names some of his favorite trinkets.

item.title: Legendary Thread: 1UP's World of WarCraft Podcast - 12/18/2008
item.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
item.itunes:subtitle: In this special episode of Legendary Thread we interview The Guild star and writer, Felicia Day about moving her show to Xbox LIVE for its second season, stalkers, and a whole lot of other shenanigans. Check it out!
item.description: In this special episode of Legendary Thread we interview The Guild star and writer, Felicia Day about moving her show to Xbox LIVE for its second season, stalkers, and a whole lot of other shenanigans. Check it out!

item.title: Legendary Thread: 1UP's World of WarCraft Podcast - 12/11/2008
item.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
item.itunes:subtitle: Legendary Thread gets a shave and a haircut as we introduce Mikey Nguyen and his WoW Soundboard of Awesome. We then dive into our Lich King experiences and share our first impressions of the adventure so far.
item.description: Legendary Thread gets a shave and a haircut as we introduce Mikey Nguyen and his WoW Soundboard of Awesome. We then dive into our Lich King experiences and share our first impressions of the adventure so far.

item.title: Legendary Thread: 1UP's World of WarCraft Podcast - 11/13/2008
item.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
item.itunes:subtitle: Show alumni Jeff Green and Karen Chu join the group in anticipation of Wrath of the Lich King, and we also interview Blizzard Lead World Designer Alex Afrasiabi.
item.description: Show alumni Jeff Green and Karen Chu join the group in anticipation of Wrath of the Lich King, and we also interview Blizzard Lead World Designer Alex Afrasiabi.

item.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
item.itunes:subtitle: The group discusses pre-Wrath class balance, zombies, the latest beta patch notes, and a bit of Warhammer.

item.title: Legendary Thread: 1UP's World of WarCraft Podcast - 09/25/2008
item.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
item.itunes:subtitle: Warhammer's Josh Drescher joins us to chat about WAR's launch and answer lore questions from quizmaster Anthony Gallegos. It's a relatively slow week for WoW news, but we also cover upcoming Blizzcon schwag, BOE motorcycle mounts, and upcoming Priest changes.
item.description: Warhammer's Josh Drescher joins us to chat about WAR's launch and answer lore questions from quizmaster Anthony Gallegos. It's a relatively slow week for WoW news, but we also cover upcoming Blizzcon schwag, BOE motorcycle mounts, and upcoming Priest changes.

item.title: Legendary Thread: 1UP's World of WarCraft Podcast - 09/11/2008
item.itunes:author: 1UP Staff
item.itunes:subtitle: Covering more WotLK beta changes, the impending launch of Warhammer Online, Eve's new expansion, and the long, slow goodbye to Jeff Green.
item.description: Covering more WotLK beta changes, the impending launch of Warhammer Online, Eve's new expansion, and the long, slow goodbye to Jeff Green.
